Really good stuff, by the way where did you get this
I can have a go cleaning it up and editing into tracks if you like... however I did notice one or two cases of distortion, looks like the needle pretty much jumped out of the groove?
If there is any distortion, it came from the guitar - not my turntable. I know how to set the the stylus pressure and ant-skate. The needle doesn't "jump the groove" on my deck.

Gee buddy. You are a legend, getting this and putting it up. Thanks for it. I'm gonna dl it tonight.

Hi all,
I've uploaded my attempt at restoring this release here: http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/4589468
hope people enjoy it.

Where did I get it? A buddy of mine won this record set at a charity auction.

i downloaded this a year ago and it sounds great. i also re-uploaded it for a friend cuz i couldnt remember where i dl'd it from. my torrent is dead now but yours is still kicking that is awesome! keep good tunes alive!!. great rip btw.
